main.title: About me

p1.been: I'm Alfredo. I have been coding for 8 years. As a FrontEnd Engineer, I specialize creating stunning digital products using Vue, Nuxt and TailwindCSS ecosystem.

p2.pemexWork: as a FrontEnd Web Engineer, building a platform for contract management.
p2.joinBrandsWork: a content creators platform to make branded UGC.

main.p3: I am passionate about working at the intersection of product, engineering, and developer experience. I get excited by TailwindCSS, Vue, serverless technologies, Open Source, frontend simplicity, and minimalism. I love automating processes, building user-centric products, and enjoying a good cappuccino during a productive workday.
main.p4: I was born and raised in Le√≥n, Guanajuato, Mexico and come from studying Computer Systems Engineering
